main event: A large red-orange object was observed hovering in the sky over Peekskill, New York, emitting sparks and flashes of light.
interesting points: The object appeared to be about the size of the full moon and was a bright white color., It moved slowly across the sky for about 15 minutes before moving out of sight to the south., The object was observed while watching television and appeared to be rotating or tumbling., One or more persons in a nearby car also observed the object., The object made no sound that could be heard from the ground.
witness description: one individual and one or more persons in a car
